Includes, but is not limited to, by unit, membership interest, or other ownership interest. Investment includes, but is not limited to, investment in certain hedge funds, venture capital funds, private equity funds, real estate partnerships or funds. Excludes fair value disclosure.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNoncontrollin.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

NetRentableArea.label: Net Rentable Area
NetRentableArea.description: Net rentable area for properties owned.

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionDebtAssum.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Debt Assumed
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionDebtAssum.description: "The amount of debt that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionNetNonmon.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Net Nonmonetary Assets Acquired (Liabilities Assumed)
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionNetNonmon.description: "The net book value of a nonmonetary asset transferred or exchanged in connection with the acquisition of a business or asset in a noncash transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. Nonmonetary assets and liabilities are assets and liabilities that will not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the future."

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionValueOfAs.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Value of Assets Acquired
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionValueOfAs.description: "The value of an asset or business acquired in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionValueOfLi.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Value of Liabilities Assumed
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionValueOfLi.description: "The total amount of [all] liabilities that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Nonoperating Income (Expense)
NonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: The aggregate amount of income or expense from ancillary business-related activities (that is to say, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

NotesAndLoansReceivableNetNoncurrent.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
NotesAndLoansReceivableNetNoncurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as noncurrent.

NotesReceivableGross.label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

NotesReceivableNet.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

NumberOfBusinessesAcquired.label: Number of Businesses Acquired
NumberOfBusinessesAcquired.description: The number of businesses acquired by the entity during the period.

NumberOfRealEstateProperties.label: Number of Real Estate Properties
NumberOfRealEstateProperties.description: The number of real estate properties owned as of the balance sheet date.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

NumberOfStatesInWhichEntityOperates.label: Number of States in which Entity Operates
NumberOfStatesInWhichEntityOperates.description: The number of states the entity operates in as of the balance sheet date.

OffMarketLeaseUnfavorable.label: Off-market Lease, Unfavorable
OffMarketLeaseUnfavorable.description: This element represents a liability associated with the acquisition of an off-market lease when the terms of the lease are unfavorable to the market terms for the lease at the date of acquisition.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OperatingIncomeLoss.label: Operating Income (Loss)
OperatingIncomeLoss.description: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

OperatingLeaseExpense.label: Operating Lease, Expense
OperatingLeaseExpense.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

OperatingLeaseLeaseIncome.label: Operating Lease, Lease Income
OperatingLeaseLeaseIncome.description: Amount of operating lease income from lease payments and variable lease payments paid and payable to lessor. Includes, but is not limited to, variable lease payments not included in measurement of lease receivable.

OperatingLeaseLeaseIncomeLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Lease Income, Lease Payments
OperatingLeaseLeaseIncomeLeasePayments.description: Amount of operating lease income from lease payments paid and payable to lessor. Excludes variable lease payments not included in measurement of lease receivable.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Payments
OperatingLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future minimum rental payments in aggregate as of the balance sheet date under operating leases.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Current
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within one year of the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the fifth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the fourth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the third year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the second year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Remainder of Fiscal Year
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments receivable in the remainder of the fiscal year following the latest fiscal year ended for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future minimum lease payments receivable under operating leases for periods greater than five years following the balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementContingent.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Contingent Revenue
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementContingent.description: Amount of contingent rental revenue recognized for the period under lease, based on the occurrences of an event or condition.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseReven.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Lease Revenue
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementLeaseReven.description: The total amount of revenue recognized for the period from operating leases, including minimum lease revenue, contingent revenue, percentage revenue and sublease revenue.

OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementMinimumLea.label: Operating Leases, Income Statement, Minimum Lease Revenue
OperatingLeasesIncomeStatementMinimumLea.description: The total amount of lease revenue recognized for the period for which the lessee was obligated under leasing arrangements regardless of any other events or conditions. This amount excludes contingent revenue and sublease revenue.

OperatingLeaseVariableLeaseIncome.label: Operating Lease, Variable Lease Income
OperatingLeaseVariableLeaseIncome.description: Amount of operating lease income from variable lease payments paid and payable to lessor, excluding amount included in measurement of lease receivable.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax and before reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), Reclassification, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax, of reclassification of gain (loss) from accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) for derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQ.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQ.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.description: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI on Derivatives, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income of accumulated gain (loss) realized from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

PaymentsForDepositsOnRealEstateAcquisiti.label: Payments for Deposits on Real Estate Acquisitions
PaymentsForDepositsOnRealEstateAcquisiti.description: Cash outflow related to amounts given in advance to show or confirm an intention to complete an acquisition of land, buildings, other structures, or any item classified as real estate.

PaymentsForProceedsFromDepositOnLoan.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Deposit on Loan
PaymentsForProceedsFromDepositOnLoan.description: The net cash inflow or outflow from resulting from payment, receipt or drawdown of cash deposit to guarantee a loan during the period.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Debt Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Common Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsCommonStock.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to common shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Noncontrolling Interest
PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Stock Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfStockIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow for cost incurred directly with the issuance of an equity security.

PaymentsToAcquireAndDevelopRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire and Develop Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireAndDevelopRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land and anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it and so forth, and payments to develop real estate assets by adding improvements on or to a parcel of land. Such improvements may include drainage, utilities, subdividing, access, buildings, and any combination of these elements. Including real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excluding real estate acquired for use by the owner.

PaymentsToAcquireCommercialRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Commercial Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireCommercialRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of property as primarily intended to generate income for its owner.

PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.label: Payments to Acquire Equity Method Investments
PaymentsToAcquireEquityMethodInvestments.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of or advances to an equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

PaymentsToAcquireHeldForSaleRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Held-for-sale Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireHeldForSaleRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

PaymentsToAcquireHeldToMaturitySecuritie.label: Payments to Acquire Held-to-maturity Securities
PaymentsToAcquireHeldToMaturitySecuritie.description: Amount of cash outflow through purchase of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

PaymentsToAcquireInterestInJointVenture.label: Payments to Acquire Interest in Joint Venture
PaymentsToAcquireInterestInJointVenture.description: The cash outflow associated with the investment in or advances to an entity in which the reporting entity shares control of the entity with another party or group.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment.description: The cash outflow associated with purchasing loans held for investment purposes during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireMortgageBackedSecuritie.label: Payments to Acquire Mortgage-backed Securities (MBS), Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireMortgageBackedSecuritie.description: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of mortgage-backed security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate
PaymentsToAcquireRealEstate.description: The cash outflow from the acquisition of a piece of land, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it and so forth; includes real estate intended to generate income for the owner; excludes real estate acquired for use by the owner.

PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateAndRealEstate.label: Payments to Acquire Real Estate and Real Estate Joint Ventures
PaymentsToAcquireRealEstateAndRealEstate.description: The cash outflow associated with the purchase of real estate held-for-investment and real estate joint ventures.

PaymentsToAcquireTradingSecuritiesHeldfo.label: Payments to Acquire Trading Securities Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireTradingSecuritiesHeldfo.description: The cash outflow to acquire securities classified as trading securities and held for investment purposes. Excludes payments for trading securities purchased and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time).

PaymentsToDevelopRealEstateAssets.label: Payments to Develop Real Estate Assets
PaymentsToDevelopRealEstateAssets.description: Payments to develop real estate assets is the process of adding improvements on or to a parcel of land. Such improvements may include drainage, utilities, subdividing, access, buildings, and any combination of these elements; and are generally classified as cash flow from investing activities.

PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.label: Payments to Noncontrolling Interests
PaymentsToMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash outflow to a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but not limited to, reduction of noncontrolling interest ownership. Excludes dividends paid to the noncontrolling interest.

PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.label: Preferred Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
PreferredStockParOrStatedValuePerShare.description: Face amount or stated value per share of preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesIssued.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Issued
PreferredStockSharesIssued.description: Total number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) issued to shareholders (includes related preferred shares that were issued, repurchased, and remain in the treasury). May be all or portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. Excludes preferred shares that are classified as debt.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValue.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Issued
PreferredStockValue.description: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable preferred shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.label: Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
PrepaidExpenseAndOtherAssets.description: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits in future periods, and amount of other assets.

ProceedsFromDebtNetOfIssuanceCosts.label: Proceeds from Debt, Net of Issuance Costs
ProceedsFromDebtNetOfIssuanceCosts.description: The cash inflow from additional borrowings, net of cash paid to third parties in connection with debt origination.

ProceedsFromDepositsOnRealEstateSales.label: Proceeds from Deposits on Real Estate Sales
ProceedsFromDepositsOnRealEstateSales.description: Cash inflow related to amounts received in advance from a potential buyer showing or confirming an intention to complete an acquisition of land, buildings, other structures, or any item classified as real estate.

ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution, Return of Capital
ProceedsFromEquityMethodInvestmentDivide.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return of investment, classified as investing activities. Excludes distribution for return on investment, classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementInvesting.label: Proceeds from Insurance Settlement, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromInsuranceSettlementInvesting.description: Amount of cash inflow for proceeds from settlement of insurance claim, classified as investing activities. Excludes insurance settlement classified as operating activities.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Stock
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonStock.description: The cash inflow from the additional capital contribution to the entity.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfDebt.description: The cash inflow during the period from additional borrowings in aggregate debt. Includes proceeds from short-term and long-term debt.

ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.label: Proceeds from Lines of Credit
ProceedsFromLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash inflow from contractual arrangement with the lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

ProceedsFromLoanOriginations1.label: Proceeds from Loan Originations
ProceedsFromLoanOriginations1.description: Cash inflow associated with loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property) or lease origination.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.label: Proceeds from Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash inflow from a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, purchase of additional shares or other increase in noncontrolling interest ownership.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.label: Proceeds from (Payments for) Other Financing Activities
ProceedsFromPaymentsForOtherFinancingAct.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities classified as other.

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromSaleOfFinanceReceivables.label: Proceeds from Sale of Finance Receivables
ProceedsFromSaleOfFinanceReceivables.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of receivables arising from the financing of goods and services.

ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForInvestment.description: The cash inflow from Sales of Loans Held For Investment.

ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageBackedSecuriti.label: Proceeds from Sale of Mortgage-backed Securities (MBS), Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfMortgageBackedSecuriti.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in mortgage-backed security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.description: Cash received for the sale of real estate that is not part of an investing activity during the current period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstateHeldforinves.description: Cash received from the sale of real estate that is held for investment, that is, it is part of an investing activity during the period.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciation.description: Amount of accumulated depreciation pertaining to real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationDepreci.label: Real Estate Accumulated Depreciation, Depreciation Expense (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationDepreci.description: Amount of depreciation expense for the period.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationOtherDe.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Other Deduction
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationOtherDe.description: Amount of other deductions to accumulated depreciation, excluding sales, for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationRealEst.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Investment in Real Estate Sold
RealEstateAccumulatedDepreciationRealEst.description: Amount of decrease to accumulated depreciation for real estate investments sold for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAmou.label: SEC Schedule III, Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Amount of Encumbrances
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationAmou.description: Amount of lien or mortgage outstanding on real estate investment properties for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.label: Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Carrying Amount of Land and Buildings and Improvements (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationCarr.description: Gross amount at which land and buildings and improvements are carried at the end of the period for each property.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Initial Cost of Building and Improvements
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.description: Initial cost of buildings and improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate and Accumulated Depreciation, Initial Cost of Land
RealEstateAndAccumulatedDepreciationInit.description: Initial cost of land for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate. Excludes real estate not held as an investment or interest.

RealEstateCostOfRealEstateSold.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Cost of Investment in Real Estate Sold
RealEstateCostOfRealEstateSold.description: Amount of real estate investments sold for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateFederalIncomeTaxBasis.label: SEC Schedule III, Real Estate, Federal Income Tax Basis
RealEstateFederalIncomeTaxBasis.description: Cost basis of real estate investments for federal income tax purposes for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Gross
RealEstateGrossAtCarryingValue.description: Amount, before accumulated depreciation, of real estate investment by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate. Excludes real estate not held as investment or interest.

RealEstateHeldforsale.label: Real Estate Held-for-sale
RealEstateHeldforsale.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of investments in land and buildings held for sale, excluding real estate considered to be inventory of the entity.

RealEstateImprovements.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Improvements
RealEstateImprovements.description: Amount of increase in real estate investments related to improvements for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateInventoryCapitalizedInterestCo.label: Real Estate Inventory, Capitalized Interest Costs
RealEstateInventoryCapitalizedInterestCo.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest costs that were capitalized to properties under development during the land development and construction period of a project, and which are included in inventory.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Accumulated Depreciation
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAccumulatedD.description: The cumulative amount of depreciation for real estate property held for investment purposes.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost.label: Real Estate Investment Property, at Cost
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyAtCost.description: Amount of real estate investment property which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.label: Real Estate Investment Property, Net
RealEstateInvestmentPropertyNet.description: Amount of real estate investment property, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; and (7) other real estate investments.

RealEstateInvestments.label: Real Estate Investments, Net
RealEstateInvestments.description: Amount of real estate investments, net of accumulated depreciation, which may include the following: (1) land available-for-sale; (2) land available-for-development; (3) investments in building and building improvements; (4) tenant allowances; (5) developments in-process; (6) rental properties; (7) other real estate investments; (8) real estate joint ventures; and (9) unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented.

RealEstateOtherAcquisitions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Other Acquisition
RealEstateOtherAcquisitions.description: Amount of increase in real estate investments from acquisitions other than through foreclosure for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateOtherAdditions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Other Addition
RealEstateOtherAdditions.description: Amount of other additions excluding acquisition or improvement to real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateOtherDeductions.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Other Deduction
RealEstateOtherDeductions.description: Amount of other deductions to real estate investments, excluding sales, for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

RealEstateTaxExpense.label: Real Estate Tax Expense
RealEstateTaxExpense.description: A tax based on the assessed value of real estate by the local government. The tax is usually based on the value of property (including the land).

ReceivableWithImputedInterestEffectiveYi.label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Effective Yield (Interest Rate)
ReceivableWithImputedInterestEffectiveYi.description: Yield on the receivable, on which interest has been imputed, as calculated from its issuance value or purchase price. The calculated effective interest rate considers factors such as the issued face value or price paid for the receivable, the time period between payments, and the time until maturity [full receipt] of the receivable.

ReceivableWithImputedInterestFaceAmount.label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Face Amount
ReceivableWithImputedInterestFaceAmount.description: The principal amount of the receivable or note before consideration of the discount or premium.

ReceivableWithImputedInterestNetAmount.label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Net Amount
ReceivableWithImputedInterestNetAmount.description: The receivable or note face amount less the unamortized discount or premium.

RepaymentsOfDebt.label: Repayments of Debt
RepaymentsOfDebt.description: The cash outflow during the period from the repayment of aggregate short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of capital lease obligations.

RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLinesOfCredit.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of an obligation from a lender, including but not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements.

RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.label: Repayments of Long-term Lines of Credit
RepaymentsOfLongTermLinesOfCredit.description: The cash outflow for the settlement of obligation drawn from a contractual arrangement with the lender, including letter of credit, standby letter of credit and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a specific amount at any point in time with maturities due beyond one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

RestrictedCash.label: Restricted Cash
RestrictedCash.description: Amount of cash restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAccumulatedDepre.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Accumulated Depreciation, Depreciation Expense
SECScheduleIIIRealEstateAccumulatedDepre.description: Amount of depreciation expense of real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

SECScheduleIIIRealEstateWritedownOrReser.label: SEC Schedule, 12-28, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Real Estate, Write-down or Reserve, Amount
SECScheduleIIIRealEstateWritedownOrReser.description: Amount of write-down or reserve recognized in the income statement on real estate investments for entities with a substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of equity-based payment instruments, excluding stock (or unit) options, that vested during the reporting period.

SharePrice.label: Share Price
SharePrice.description: Price of a single share of a number of saleable stocks of a company.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesDividendRei.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Dividend Reinvestment Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesDividendRei.description: Number of shares issued during the period from a dividend reinvestment plan (DRIP). A dividend reinvestment plan allows the shareholders to reinvest dividends paid to them by the entity on new issues of stock by the entity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Acquisitions
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueAcquisitions.description: Value of stock issued pursuant to acquisitions during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueDividendRein.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Dividend Reinvestment Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueDividendRein.description: Value of stock issued during the period from a dividend reinvestment plan (DRIP). A dividend reinvestment plan allows the holder of the stock to reinvest dividends paid to them by the entity on new issues of stock by the entity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Restricted Stock Award, Net of Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueRestrictedSt.description: Value of stock related to Restricted Stock Awards issued during the period, net of the stock value of such awards forfeited.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockRedeemedOrCalledDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Redeemed or Called During Period, Value
StockRedeemedOrCalledDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock bought back by the entity at the exercise price or redemption price.

StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.label: Stock Repurchased and Retired During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedAndRetiredDuringPeriodSh.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased and retired during the period.

StraightLineRent.label: Straight Line Rent
StraightLineRent.description: Difference between actual rental income due and rental income recognized on a straight-line basis.

TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountAttributabl.label: Temporary Equity, Carrying Amount, Attributable to Parent
TemporaryEquityCarryingAmountAttributabl.description: Carrying amount, attributable to parent, of an entity's issued and outstanding stock which is not included within permanent equity. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. Includes stock with a put option held by an ESOP and stock redeemable by a holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TemporaryEquityIssuePeriodIncreaseOrDecr.label: Temporary Equity, Carrying Amount, Period Increase (Decrease)
TemporaryEquityIssuePeriodIncreaseOrDecr.description: Change in the value of each type or class of stock classified as temporary equity during the period. The redemption requirement does not constitute an unconditional obligation that will be settled in a variable number of shares constituting a monetary value predominantly indexed to (a) a fixed monetary amount known at inception, (b) an amount inversely correlated with the residual value of the entity, or (c) an amount determined by reference to something other than the fair value of issuer's stock. Does not include mandatorily redeemable stock. The exception is if redemption is required upon liquidation or termination of the reporting entity.

TemporaryEquitySharesAuthorized.label: Temporary Equity, Shares Authorized
TemporaryEquitySharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of securities classified as temporary equity that are permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TemporaryEquitySharesOutstanding.label: Temporary Equity, Shares Outstanding
TemporaryEquitySharesOutstanding.description: The number of securities classified as temporary equity that have been issued and are held by the entity's shareholders. Securities outstanding equals securities issued minus securities held in treasury. Temporary equity is a security with redemption features that are outside the control of the issuer, is not classified as an asset or liability in conformity with GAAP, and is not mandatorily redeemable. Includes any type of security that is redeemable at a fixed or determinable price or on a fixed or determinable date or dates, is redeemable at the option of the holder, or has conditions for redemption which are not solely within the control of the issuer. If convertible, the issuer does not control the actions or events necessary to issue the maximum number of shares that could be required to be delivered under the conversion option if the holder exercises the option to convert the stock to another class of equity. If the security is a warrant or a rights issue, the warrant or rights issue is considered to be temporary equity if the issuer cannot demonstrate that it would be able to deliver upon the exercise of the option by the holder in all cases. Includes stock with put option held by ESOP and stock redeemable by holder only in the event of a change in control of the issuer.

TenantReimbursements.label: Tenant Reimbursements (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
TenantReimbursements.description: In accordance with the provisions of their lease agreement, this element represents allowable charges due a landlord from its tenant. In retail store and office building leases, for example, tenant reimbursements may cover items such as taxes, utilities, and common area expenses.

UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationF.label: Unamortized Loan Commitment and Origination Fees and Unamortized Discounts or Premiums
UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationF.description: Amount of deferred fees paid by borrowers and unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of loans that are being amortized into income as an adjustment to yield. Excludes amounts for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesAndCommod.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives and Commodity Contracts
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivativesAndCommod.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of open derivatives, commodity, or energy contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.label: Write off of Deferred Debt Issuance Cost
WriteOffOfDeferredDebtIssuanceCost.description: Write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance cost in an extinguishment of debt.

AdvancesToAffiliate.label: Advances to Affiliate
AdvancesToAffiliate.description: Long-Term advances receivable from a party that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership. This does not include advances to clients.

ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsToBeDisposedO.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets to be Disposed of
ImpairmentOfLongLivedAssetsToBeDisposedO.description: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long-lived assets held for abandonment, exchange or sale.

InterestIncomeExpenseNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

MarketableSecurities.label: Marketable Securities
MarketableSecurities.description: Amount of investment in marketable security.

MortgageBackedSecuritiesAvailableForSale.label: Mortgage-backed Securities Available-for-sale, Fair Value Disclosure
MortgageBackedSecuritiesAvailableForSale.description: Fair value of securitized, pay-through debt securities collateralized by real estate mortgage loans classified as available-for-sale.

MortgageLoansOnRealEstateForeclosures.label: SEC Schedule, 12-29, Real Estate Companies, Investment in Mortgage Loans on Real Estate, Foreclosure
MortgageLoansOnRealEstateForeclosures.description: Amount of decrease in investment in mortgage loan on real estate by entity with substantial portion of business acquiring and holding investment real estate or interest in real estate, from foreclosure.

NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromBusine.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Business Combination
NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromBusine.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from a business combination.

RealEstateInvestmentsUnconsolidatedRealE.label: Real Estate Investments, Unconsolidated Real Estate and Other Joint Ventures
RealEstateInvestmentsUnconsolidatedRealE.description: The carrying amount of investments in unconsolidated real estate and other joint ventures not separately presented. This includes direct and indirect investments.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccumulate.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain (Loss), before Tax
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccumulate.description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain (loss) in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedGainLoss.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

GainOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Gain on Sale of Investments
GainOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The difference between the carrying value and the sale price of an investment. A gain would be recognized when the sale price of the investment is greater than the carrying value of the investment. This element refers to the Gain included in earnings and not to the cash proceeds of the sale.

MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Distributions to Noncontrolling Interest Holders
MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest balance from payment of dividends or other distributions by the non-wholly owned subsidiary or partially owned entity, included in the consolidation of the parent entity, to the noncontrolling interest holders.

ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.label: Proceeds from Sale of Equity Method Investments
ProceedsFromSaleOfEquityMethodInvestment.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of equity method investments, which are investments in joint ventures and entities in which the entity has an equity ownership interest normally of 20 to 50 percent and exercises significant influence.

ConversionOfStockAmountConverted1.label: Conversion of Stock, Amount Converted
ConversionOfStockAmountConverted1.description: "The value of the stock converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage.label: Debt Instrument, Redemption Price, Percentage
DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage.description: Percentage price of original principal amount of debt at which debt can be redeemed by the issuer.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Liability, Gain (Loss) Included in Other Comprehensive Income (Loss)
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI) from liability measured at fair value on recurring basis using unobservable input (level 3).

EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedGain.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Unrealized Gain
EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedGain.description: Amount of unrealized gain on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedLoss.label: Equity Securities, FV-NI, Unrealized Loss
EquitySecuritiesFvNiUnrealizedLoss.description: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

NoncashOrPartNoncashDivestitureAmountOfC.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Divestiture, Amount of Consideration Received
NoncashOrPartNoncashDivestitureAmountOfC.description: Amount of noncash consideration received for selling an asset or business through a noncash (or part noncash) transaction.

CashCollateralForBorrowedSecurities.label: Cash Collateral for Borrowed Securities
CashCollateralForBorrowedSecurities.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of cash collateral held for borrowed securities, for which the cash is restricted as to withdrawal or usage.

DebtAndEquitySecuritiesUnrealizedGainLos.label: Debt and Equity Securities, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
DebtAndEquitySecuritiesUnrealizedGainLos.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt and equity securities.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Interest Receivable, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedInterestReceiva.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from borrowers for interest payments.

IncreaseDecreaseInRestructuringReserve.label: Increase (Decrease) in Restructuring Reserve
IncreaseDecreaseInRestructuringReserve.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions of the accrual) of the liability pertaining to the exit from or disposal of business activities or restructuring pursuant to a duly authorized plan, excluding costs or losses pertaining to an entity newly acquired in a business combination and to asset retirement obligations.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

MarketableSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.label: Marketable Securities, Realized Gain (Loss)
MarketableSecuritiesRealizedGainLoss.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment in marketable security, including other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

PaymentsToAcquireFinanceReceivables.label: Payments to Acquire Finance Receivables
PaymentsToAcquireFinanceReceivables.description: The cash outflow for the purchase of amounts due from customers, clients, lessees, borrowers, or others under the terms of its agreements therewith.

TangibleAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Tangible Asset Impairment Charges
TangibleAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the aggregate write down of tangible assets from their carrying value to their fair value.
